DOC.brief_title: IMRT Combined With Erlotinib EGFR Wild Type Non-small Cell Lung Cancer With 4-10 Brain Metastases
DOC.detailed_description: This study ass efficacy IMRT combine erlotinib compare whole-brain radiotherapy EGFR wild type non-small cell lung cancer 4-10 brain metastasis . All patient recruit randomly assign two group . Patients experimental group receive daily IMRT 45 Gy 15 fraction brain metastasis , combine daily erlotinib 150mg three week . Patients control group receive daily whole-brain radiotherapy 30 Gy 10 fraction .
